TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, it now crashes for a perfectly normal reason: your computer exploding.

I wish that I had more time on my hands.

Granted, every second of normal time is a day for you. But you age at that advanced rate as well.

I wish for more conversations in the off topic forum.

Granted. A box of rolex wristwatches will now be on your way, so you can wear them all, thus giving you more time. oof, sniped once more

Granted, but they go off-topic more often now.

I wish for KSP to go virtual reality.

Granted, you become Jeb in the virtual reality.

I wish that my posts would not kill the conversations.

Granted, they kill yourself instead now.

I wish my Englishing skills were biggerer.

Granted, your English skills completely overshadows everyone else's so no one can understand you complex speech or writing.

I wish I could exist on the forums for eternity.

Granted but mods deleted your account instead...

I wish KSP would become KSP...

Granted, Kerbal Space Program is now Kute Space-related Pens, a game about pineapples of all things.

I wish that it wasn't so hot in Arizona. The 24/7 summer heat here makes excursions to the so called "outside world" very difficult for around 3 more months

granted you are now in norway

i wish i had the AVATAr valkery in ksp

Granted, but it catches fire.

I wish for colder climate in Sweden over the summer. Bloody unbearable.

Granted, but it will be 1kelvin.

I wish that I could help the ESA

Granted. You have been registered and are now a member of Excrement Segregation Association, a nonprofit organization whose job is to sort all types of excrement for recycling.

I wish for lasers.

Granted. They shine into your eyes and blind you for life.

I wish KSP was Kettle Simulation Program!

Granted. Watching kettles work is incredibly boring and KSP no longer exists. Thanks jerk.

I wish I could find Someone...Out there...

You find me. Unfortunately, I'm not at all interested in you.

I wish I had some cookies.

Granted. They were baked with the fury of Hell and coated in arsenic. It was then covered by a layer of whipped creme laced with cyanide. Well then... someone must've really had it out for you.

I wish for a hilarious GIF

Granted. They were baked with the fury of Hell and coated in arsenic. It was then covered by a layer of whipped creme laced with cyanide. Well then... someone must've really had it out for you.

I wish for a hilarious GIF

Granted but nobody finds it funny.

I wish I could get the .20 update and my game (and mods) not get erased or game crash.

Granted, but now you don't have any electricity to run your computer after you for some strange reason went on a long, psychotic rant against the power company.

I wish that it was easier to get to orbit anywhere.

Granted, but now you don't have any electricity to run your computer after you for some strange reason went on a long, psychotic rant against the power company.

I wish that it was easier to get to orbit anywhere.

Granted but only around Eloo

I wish that someone will tell me how to update and my game without erasing the data I mentioned before without corrupting (please) this only to corrupt my second wish which is I wish for an Ice cream

Granted. the poster of this comment gets confused and corrupts your first wish whilst eating an ice cream.

I wish people knew the purpose of this thread

Granted, you die upon realisation

I wish that the events of 11:30 today did not happen.

granted they happen at 12:00 instead

i wish for more time on my re test

Granted, you have minus one year extra time.

I wish I could never get into trouble.

Granted. No one else does, either. You get killed, and no one cares.

I wish I get to make the next house of madness.

Granted, but I'm in charge.

I wish we will now make the next house of madness
